TopicTitle: Help needed: Searching for a certain modd...

Articles.Content:
Hi there guys...

Im in search of a skybox that makes the universe looks more real but without rescaling it... I've looked at the Real solar system mod but i dont know if its suitable for me taste, seeing its quite an huge mod i believe... Couple of years back, raredens made a mod with replaced the default skybox with realistic looking universe by just simply replacing the textures the games uses...

Still got mod laying around on my harddrive but i don't know if its still compatible with the current game version...

So if anyone can guide me into the right direction in what kind of mod i need or how to do this, please tell me... because i've been out of the game for quite awhile, only sometimes playing
Have you looked at texture replacer I'm sure that can do it for you.
Have looked at it and yep that was what i was using back then... downloading now
RSS also has a 1/10th size config so that you can have all the right planets, at more kerbal sizes (Does not require the overhaul, though FAR is highly recommended)
yes but i dont want to rescale my game, only change the visuals of the game...
